website_summaries.verdict: An affordable alternative to Galaxy Buds+ or AirPods. Impressive battery life and multiple included buds to find the right fit.
pros: With a 6-hour battery life and a charging case that holds up to 7 hours of charge, these earbuds work well for on-the-go use
With the Samsung app, Ambient Awareness mode can be enabled for running or navigating busy city streets

website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks, these earbuds have user-friendly features and nice sound quality. A good choice for those who use Android.
pros: These wireless earbuds pair easily with Samsung devices, and offer decent battery life as well as a comfortable fit for most wearers
Case is also a wireless charging dock
cons: Buds occasionally lose connectivity, especially when your phone is in your pocket
Touch controls are somewhat quirky, and mic is difficult to adjust

customer_reviews.title: No giant things hanging out of my ears.
customer_reviews.text: Excited to be able to get rid of these weird air pods.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie boy

customer_reviews.title: So far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Just had them a couple hours and pairing them was easy. I love these, i have small ears and they fit great. The bass is good for me; i don't get why people criticized it.If you want to increase volume keep in mind that the buds have their own volume control. Fast shipping made these worth every penny. Will update review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus R.

customer_reviews.title: Had them for only 3 hours and I have problems already.
customer_reviews.text: first i want to say the sound quality is great in my opinion...... that's it. Now straight to the point. I recieved these buds around 2pm I started using them Immediately, when I was on the phone it hung up on the caller twice 5pm today the right ear bud disconnected on me and will now reconnect I charged and still won't reconnect the right ear bud is done I didn't get a chance to use the buds at it's full potential... I'm disappointed and want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: jamin

customer_reviews.title: Great Job Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Well looks like I have a new daily pair of headphones. Quality beats out my airpods by far. If you had the previous gen headphones get these they are by far better and the feel amazing in your ear compared to every headphone I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan shellabarger1

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly convenient with the way they pair and with the fact that you can just set them on a wireless charger. The sound isn't bad, but it's not the best I've heard either. Kind of expected just a bit more sound for the money, but I'm not complaining since the features they have make up for it. Watch out with the seller thoe!! I ordered a new pair and when I got them I could tell they weren't brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Soneeuhz

customer_reviews.title: Single connections only???
customer_reviews.text: In this day in age supporting two profiles is a must (pc and phone, phone and second phone) is a standard and a requirement. Why Samsung would only allow a single connection takes away from all the awesome things these buds can do. One update to the firmware is all it would take. So until Samsung grows up this gets a one. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey72

customer_reviews.title: Ok wireless is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far. Trick I didn't know is holding the side buttons down for 3+ seconds will put it in pairing mode. Noise cancelling is pretty good, still messing with which ear piece size I'm using. The ambient is ok, I go from barely hearing to kind of hearing environment. Basically enough that I can grab context but might miss details. Love the ability to modify the sound details in the app!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Asbury

customer_reviews.title: poor quality not loud at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these headphones about a week ago hoping that they would be awesome. After trying to wear them they were very comfortable but out of the box completely dead not even 1% battery life witch disappointing for being such a premium product to be shipped completely dead. sound quality - very little Bass the reason I returned them is at full volume the headphones were not even loud whatsoever I $50 ENACFIRE Future earbuds off Amazon we're probably almost 3x times louder then Samsung at Double the price. I was expecting premium quality earbuds from all the hype from the Samsung commercials I love my S9 but these earbuds are awful.
customer_reviews.author: builder

customer_reviews.title: SUPER PLEASED.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping! So worth the money! I'm obsessed🤗 I'd definitely recommend them to anyone who loves music.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: They can't make em fast enough.
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of BK. Paid more then retail but I don't mind because they are amazing. Wanted a 2nd pair so I got lucky and snatched up a pair here. Yes I paid way more but these earbuds are worth it. A well designed rock solid product. Using a Samsung Note 8 ATM.
customer_reviews.author: rdsOLDschool

customer_reviews.title: Terrible range...
customer_reviews.text: Simply fantastic. Fit is perfect and sound quality is awesome. Great Job Samsung... 8/15/19: Update... I wish I could return. Soumd is great but the range is terrible. If you have your phone by your side while walking they cut in and out. And if you try to put your phone in your pocket, forget it. I have called Samsung and performed all of the updates and they still do the same thing. I will plan to look else where for my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: CDM

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Its only been a few days but my boyfriend has had his pair for a month and he loves his. I love mine so far. The hours of being able to listen to music hands free is so nice to me. And walking around the house talking hands free while cleaning is super convenient. I'm so happy with these, they were my Mother's day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Very good earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: These have truly been the best pair of wireless earbuds I’ve ever owned! I have had many of wireless earbuds which include Airpods, Powerbeats 3, Powerbeats Pro’s and many Beats Studio headphones and I can truly say these have been great and beat any of those earbuds. I use them in the gym and I like to get in the zone, these cancel noise even when you have no music playing. They are also a very good price! Powerbeats Pro cost anywhere from 200-250$. These are half the price and sound better than those. I also have had 0 connectivity issues with these earbuds on both android and iphone devices. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Defective product and no assistance
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience One bud didn't work. Spent over an hour with technical support till they agreed. I asked to replace and was told could not accommodate that request. Was told that refund would be made only after item was returned. Was told to reorder and no guarantee that price is the same. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sy Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. I was nervous they'd be oversized like the Bose Soundsport (still an excellent product), not at all. The case is small and fits easily in your pocket and the buds themselves are perfectly sized and feel great. Easy to pair. Easier to connect after initial pairing. Sound quality is good and you can fine tune it in the wearables app. The only thing I didn't like was the touchpad, the double/triple tap takes some practice.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Savage

customer_reviews.title: latest software update broke them!
customer_reviews.text: They worked well for 45 days. Then the software update only updated the right bud. The left one did not updated. Now I can only connect to one or the other. It will not do the software update again because it wants me to connect both first. But I can't! You can read a LOT of stories about this online, and i can't believe they don't have a solution. After an hour on the phone with them, i am sending them back for a replacement. So maybe I will update this review in a few weeks. Strange...
customer_reviews.author: frugalbrutus

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues when running
customer_reviews.text: They are good but the connection issues are pretty bad when running. I use a Flipbelt and I get connection issues. It's going to make me return them wanted to love these so bad but I need solid sound on a 12-mile run. I am returning this item it cannot be used for running at all I even tried mowing my lawn and putting it in my pocket still the same issue. Done with this product. Not for an active person.
customer_reviews.author: earic

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but connection cut out
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the galaxy buds when I first got them but after a day of using them it sounded like they were cutting out. Both buds would randomly cut out in the middle of a song and would continue for about 2 minutes until I turned off the buds and reconnected them. I also have a galaxy watch, so I wonder if the simultaneous connection of my phone to my buds and watch may have caused the bad connection. The buds themselves also could've been faulty. Either way I just returned them because it was too big of a problem too soon after I bought them. Otherwise comfort and sound were great. Really disappointed I couldn't keep them.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality on Phone Calls is Bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these ear buds fit well and I wanted to love them, but had to return them because the sound quality on phone cals was so awful, it was unacceptable. Sound quality when playing back music or listening to something on the internet was terrific, but phone calls which is my primary use, was VERY VERY tinny, muddled, and unusable. I would not recommend these ear buds to at all, even if the price point was much lower. Even if they GAVE me the ear buds, the sound quality during calls is so bad, I wouldn't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellisonx

customer_reviews.title: Buy over AirPods every time
customer_reviews.text: I’m very active and was looking for daily use headphones. I’ve been borrowing my boyfriends AirPods for a while and just needed my own. I was nervous to try something new but I’m so happy I did these are great. No issue with them falling out, I’m pleasantly surprised with the sound quality and noise cancellation. What I HATE about the AirPods are how hard and uncomfortable they are and aren’t secure in the ear. They’re cheaply made and not worth the money. If you’re like me and trying to decide between AirPods and something else, being a pretty loyal Apple customer; Choose these.
customer_reviews.author: Evan C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work properly after 2 weeks dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work properly after 2 weeks dont buy, whenever i call my wife is makes a super loud obnoxious noise and she cant handle listening to it this was a horrible purchase. The mic is just gone on this thing in just 2 weeks and i kept it in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: GamerSpectrum

customer_reviews.title: Worse buying experience ever.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my SO in late November while they had their $116 deal. I was pretty excited to get them because he’s been wanting them for a while. What I got was less than desirable. I purchased what I thought was a new set but instead got used galaxy buds in a plastic bag with a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Y R

customer_reviews.title: Each ere battery drains at different speeds
customer_reviews.text: They fit nicely in the eres. They sound great the noise cancelling could be better. The big problem with them is that the right ere will drain faster then the left. I have been see as litter a 5% difference up to 25% difference in battery life. For example left would say 40% battery left and the right would say 15% battery left. But they do last for 5hrs for right and up to 7hrs for left. Also after 4 months with them they only last 3hrs now do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Manko

customer_reviews.title: Do not BUY! Right earbud goes out!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever. The right earbud is not connecting and I've tried everything. This happened with the pair I purchased in December and now on my second pair and the right ear is out. When I tried to do some research on it, I saw that there are a ton of people with the same problem. Therefore I dont understand how there are so many positive reviews here. Beware and don't buy. I spoke with Samsung and they couldn't fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write poor reviews. The earbuds are an excellent fit and the small recharging case is convenient. However, essentially out of the box, my left earbud would not hold a charge, and it took me forever to convince Samsung customer service that i knew how to charge an electronic device and that one bud was malfunctioning. After two hours of phone time, they insisted on me mailing back the buds before they would ship out a new pair - so net, I'll be without headphones for another two weeks. Terrible customer support - they should immediately ship a new pair (or a replacement left bud) while the customer continues using the working one.
customer_reviews.author: wolfeman

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this garbage
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this junk unless you like being frustrated by Samsung's latest line of half-baked garbage. These earbuds have never worked properly for me, i am constantly experiencing major sound quality issues. Each ear bud will randomly disconnect for no apparent reason, even though my phone is 3 feet away. I have a Galaxy S10, so it should just work with no issue at all. Occasionally Samsung will push an update that sort of makes the sound quality better, but they always manage to follow up with another update that breaks it. Samsung is notorious for creating a garbage product and then abondoning it after the reviews go south, which is just an awesome feeling for their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a sale (I was planning on holding out for pixel buds 2 until the sale happened). These things are really great, cannot recommend enough. Really great battery life with the small charging case, good sound, fit tightly in your ear. You can use them one at a time if you need to hear your surroundings. Pairing is super easy with an Android phone and there is an app that allows you to change EQ settings and touch pad functions. An active noise cancelling feature would have been great but for this price point I am very satisfied. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: S10e Phone
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago, I ordered the first set of Galaxy Buds. They were expensive and couldnt the battery life was horrible. These are much better. The buds are still a bit uncomfortable, but that's due to me having small ears. The battery life is much improved. The sound is good, but not great. I ordered another pair of wireless buds of which the sound is much louder. Overall, no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sherria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The buds themselves were great however after a few days of use im expierencing an issue where during calls I can hear people however they cannot hear me as there is a wierd sound muffling my voice
customer_reviews.author: Vlad G

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased as a gift and was supposed to be new. It arrived in a ziplock bag, earbuds loose, tossed around in bag and the charging cord was white and the ear buds and case were black. These were not new and were not even in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy new get used
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a brand new set of headphones. Item received came in a bag labeled new with nothing but a cable and the buds. clearly used scratched up case. Refund is in the process and I'm pissed about it
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Great for music horrible if you want to be heard on calls
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fantastic for listening to music. Customization options with Samsung Galaxy devices really helps. The Ambient Sound feature is handy if you wear them around the office. For the music listening, I gave a 2nd star otherwise they would've gotten my lowest rating possible. Here's the thing, nobody can hear you when you talk to them on the phone through the G Buds. Every single person has had the same problem hearing me as very muffled &/or with chirps or clicks that drown out my voice. As they're made to work with my phone, they're almost useless for the purpose for which I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: J Mags

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN AND SOLD AS NEW
customer_reviews.text: The left earphone was broken like someone stepped on it and tried to glue it back together. I couldnt figure out what the cracking popping noise my left ear was making until I looked closely and noticed the poor attempt at a repair. I cant imagine they would come like this from the factory. Also this isn't the first time I've been delivered an item sold as new but clearly used.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE!!! I am VERY disappointed with these headphones!!!! They're a huge waste of money, I bought these and they didn't even work for 24hrs one side was clear the other side there was no sound so I thought it was a bad batch, returned them got another brand new pair and right after the return date the same exact thing happened to the new pair I got!!! Also my friend has the all black pair and his just did the same thing he bought his straight from the Samsung website. Again DO NOT BUY THESE
customer_reviews.author: Malina

customer_reviews.title: Software is a literal nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Recieved a set with mismatched software versions Normally this wouldn't be an issue, but to update them, both buds need to connect to your phone and the case. When software is mismatched it doesn't want to recognize one of the buds which makes zero sense and this has evidently been an issue for a long time with the product with no fix in sight Just a heads up for any used product buyers out there Besides that, the one bud that DID work sounded great
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Parker Ramey

customer_reviews.title: They're great
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds. They sound great and fit well enough to wear at the gym without ever worrying about them falling out. The noise cancellation isn't complete but it's plenty to get rid of the hubbub of a corporate office. I love the feature where you can hold a finger to the touchpad and listen to what someone is saying to you. My one slight issue is that the right bud dies slightly faster than the left which is bizarre but is apparently a common problem with these. I can still get through a whole workday without having to charge them and the case holds a charge for the buds as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi

customer_reviews.title: Defective Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I knew 10 minutes into my first use of this product that I was going to return these earbuds. The sound in the left earbud dropped out intermittently. I wore my phone on my left arm in an armband and the connection was still terrible. I found that if I looked to the right with my head level while walking, they worked great, but the moment you moved your head back to straight ahead or down and the music dropped out. For $127, I would have expected a much better product from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: So much for new. . . .
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a set of galaxy buds but was cautious when the package arrived. There was a lot of loose items from what I could hear and when I opened the box, the package had opened. If they were new as described, there would be no way that would've happened. The original seal had been opened and was resealed with regular office grade tape. . . highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ivan A Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Samsung will not honor the warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, but do not buy from this vendor. They worked perfectly for about 6 months then crapped out. Both of us work in tech and tried everything... No luck. Samsung support went through the same steps we did in an effort to revive them, but ultimately told us they would need to be replaced. We sent them the order details and got the shaft. No warranty because they were purchased from an unverified vendor. Spend the extra $10 with someone else and save yourself a lot more in the long run. Jeff
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Left side stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Update: Left earbud stopped working and doesn't connect at all after 5 months use. The noise cancellation and sound quality is great! Can't lie. I am very picky about sound quality and this earbud really satisfies my sound needs. But the setting up part took longer than I expected. Especially for my laptop. A downside to this earbud is that the battery life doesn't last that long. Also, for some reason one earbud's battery runs low much faster than the other one. Don't know why this is happening.
customer_reviews.author: calicopoof

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud is louder - had 2 different sets with the same problem.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Galaxy buds, the left earbud is noticably louder. I returned the first pair for the same issue. The audio was noticeably louder on the left side. If I reversed the earbuds and put them in the wrong ears, the audio was noticeably in the right. So it isn't my ears. I tried them with multiple devices just to cover all my bases, same problem. Two in a row with the same issue, that is terrible quality control. I wanted to like these earbuds, but I'm not interested in listening to music and podcasts on my left. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Sound Quality on iPhone - IOS App will not find Buds
customer_reviews.text: I read a review online that said the sound quality was far superior to the Apple earpods. Not true. In fact, it is far inferior. The sound is very thin, and no base at all. Not what the review said. It's a Samsung product, maybe it's better on Android devices. My experience on my Apple iPhone 8 plus, software version 13.4.1, was terrible. I bought these because I was tired of being trapped in Apple's hardware/software environment. Now I am happily headed back to Apple. Steer clear of these buds!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Just get them
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I bought them on a whim hoping it would be easier to maintain privacy during video conferences and not have the restriction of a wire. They work well for that, but they work great for everything as well. Super comfortable, excellent noise cancellation, the ambient sound feature is great. Battery life is awesome too. They last long enough that I often forget to charge them just because I'm used to them always being ready
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out constantly with Samsung Galaxy S7
customer_reviews.text: The mic quality is VERY poor...unusable . The buds continually cut out unless I hold the phone within 12".. It could be that the older Bluetooth version of the phone is not distance-compatible with the newer version of Bluetooth. I cannot get ANY cordless earbuds to work with the Samsung S7, with the exception of an older version which the buds are wire connected to each other.
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: The Sweet Sounds of Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk and got these and not the buds+ and I have to say I'm still really happy. The mics are not the best in the world, but they are good for the money, no one has complained about static or me being hard to hear. Paired with the Galaxy Wear all the sound profiles are great, so many choices and also come with some great features like seeing the battery life and also an earbud finder (best feature ever). The fit is subjective, but for odd shaped ears like mine I actually didn't have an issue wearing these for an hour or two. Great buds, great purchase. My 2nd favorite outside of the Soundcore Liberty Air 2
customer_reviews.author: LQHunter

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: They fit so well in my ear, especially when compared to the competitors. They also looks stunning. Pairing with my Samsung Galaxy S10 was super easy and whenever I open the case they just turn back on. I love the ambient noise when I'm biking as well as the app's interface. Very intuitive and easy to use. I've also used these on a Google Pixel 3. All the above remains the same. There's no ACTIVE noise cancellation, but I knew that going into the purchase. There is, however, good sound isolation because of the seal formed. Battery life is decent and I love that I can just change it on my S10.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Worst earbuds I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the sound isn't very loud sometimes it fine. Biggest complaint is if you are in a loud room you cannot hear the person you are talking too and they cannot hear you. 1st. pair died within two weeks the second pair just after the Amazon return window. Luckily I purchased the extended warranty for them. Save yourself the hassle, go check out the new Jabra elite, because I think that will be my next purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Bought NEW, got USED in the mail!!!
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY upset at seller. I bought a new pair of the galaxy buds from this link, got them and the box was opened and there was dirt and scuff Mark's all over the charging case. The bus look like they have been used by multiple people and even the spare rubber ear pieces had a little wax on them. Very grossed out and like I said, I paid for a new pair, and got used... get it together...
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Attaway

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a malfunctioning pair of earbuds, they not only had connection issues, but the quality was horrible. It sounded like they were dipped in water before sending. The high end was tingy and there was no bass. I contacted Samsung, they told me to contact Amazon and request a new pair, I contacted Amazon and Amazon contacted me back to Samsung, where Samsung told me to send them the pair for repair, I sent it to them only to get them back exactly the same that I had it. This is the worst experience I have had with Samsung (and Samsung is typically good) and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects all the time! Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my Samsung Galaxy s8 and my Samsung TV. Thought it would work great since it was all from the same company, but I was wrong. The bus disconnect all the time from my phone and my TV for no reason. If use it for phone calls people complain about not hearing me well and sounds breaking up. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: One Ear Bud Compleatly went out after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product when they were working. They were easy to use and comfy. Key Phrase WERE working. I left them to charge and then woke in the morning and put them on and one was dead. Really displeased with this. I am pretty careful with them too. When i'm not wearing them I put them in the case. Never dropped them or anything. Pretty unhappy at the short life span due to the price. (Also if you are wondering I did do a bunch of trouble shooting to try and get them working. Nothing helped.)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair in three months to exhibit the same defect! The right earbud gets very quiet. There's no fix for it. Many people online are complaining of the exact same problem! Samsung chalks it up to a cleaning issue, which it is not, and offers to replace the earbuds. Who wants to continuously replace earbuds every 1-2 months! In addition, Samsung takes 2 weeks to deliver the replacements. Refunds from Amazon are only allowed for 30 days, so you are stuck. There are plenty of better options available now. Shame on you, Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: They suck bad not loud and they hurt my ears with treble.
customer_reviews.text: Wow can you say way too much treble and not loud enough? Yes I am on an iPhone yes I know I don’t have EQ options or internal bid volume change ability but that’s not my fault that’s Samsung’s fault. When you buy a Samsung tv do they punish you for having a Sony ps4 or LG sound system?? No so why punish me for not having an Android. The buds don’t even sit in the case magnetically as good as the EarPods. Apple ear pods sound so much better but I am going to try Jabra elites now to satisfy all curiosity so far Apple wins these suck and my ear hurt so bad!
customer_reviews.author: GrowingFamily18

customer_reviews.title: 3rd family member with Galaxy Buds!!
customer_reviews.text: We love Samsung products, but really love these buds for music and watching content on our phones. The call quality could be better, others always say we sound far away. To be fair, Samsung does suggest using the larger sizes of the ear adapters to make the buds fit tightly in the ear and supposedly this will increase call quality. We all use the smallest ear adapters, as they are more comfortable to wear. All in all though we love Samsung Galaxy Buds.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Hillan

customer_reviews.title: Mehta.
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality = 5 stars Battery Life = 5 stars Ambient Noise = 3 stars Pairing Ability = 4 stars Controls = 1 star - The ability to hear what was going on around me often distorted the calls. The slightest amount of noise around me made it difficult for people on my phone calls to understand me. - Despite finding a good fit with the ear piece, the right bud fell out more than once. - Followed the instructions to end call by tapping the ear bud, however some calls didn't terminate.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Hot Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading the reviews and was looking forward to using them. These things cut out when my S9+ is in my pocket just 2 feet away. They are unusable. I updated the firmware, unpared, repared, deleted the app, reinstalled the app. Nothing works. These things are over priced hot garbage. I returned them. The $50 pair of Tozos I bought a couple months ago are better than these. Also the sound quality isn’t that great either.
customer_reviews.author: RayL

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT: If you case is lost or stolen, YOU MUST BUY A WHOLE NEW SET OF EARBUDS
customer_reviews.text: If I had know this before I bought these earbuds, I would NEVER have bought them. If your case is stolen or lost, there is no way to buy a replacement case. You have to buy a whole new set of earbuds. I actually contacted Samsung support and this is their official response. They don't sell the case. They told me to buy new earbuds. Even if you ignore the terrible treatment of customers that this policy creates, it also creates tons of additional electronic waste. "Lost one piece, just throw the whole thing out and buy new ones!" Samsung claims to be a "sustainable" company. Yeah, right.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. I was anticipating the launch only to be really disappointed. For startes the size is awkward, the buds are larger than expected and the become very uncomfortable after only a few minutes of wearing. The sound quality is mediocre, however the battery life seems to be the most impressive feature. ( Alexa is Alexa ) she can be heard in loud settings i.e. walking through a busy indoor outlet mall. But they continued to fall out my ear. Im too afraid to wear them in the gym because I bbn know they are going to be a nuisance. Overall in my opinion theses Earbuds are just ok! And I hated to say that.
customer_reviews.author: My honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably Convenient To Use
customer_reviews.text: Here's the honest truth: these buds don't sound any better than their AKG wired siblings do. That's not a bad thing, both the wired and these wireless buds sound amazing, with deep bass, sharp sharps, and a wide range for different genres. What you're really paying for with these buds is the convenience. Being wireless let's you get up and move around without your phone. The buds have touch gestures that let you pause your music, and also gestures to raise or lower the volume. I can't overstate how convenient that is instead of fumbling with your phone. So if you have the expendable cash, the convenience is beyond worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Palma

customer_reviews.title: These are okay, but upgrade to the Buds+ if you can
customer_reviews.text: bought these and the Buds+ on Prime day. These were decent if you want save the money. The sound quality is night and day between these and the Buds+. The Buds are mostly treble and people hard a hard time hearing me when doing phone calls. There is much more bass in Buds+ and the charging case has better features. The Buds+ were 30 more on prime day. For 30 dollars more it's a no brainer to go with the Buds+, if that deal comes back again. If you have a Samsung phone and are on a budget the Buds are good. If you swing he extra money get the Buds+, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hiser

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Samsung galaxy buds have become permanently attached to my ears. Whether I'm driving, working, exercising, cooking, cleaning, there's always something to listen to, or good reason to just block the sound out. Noise cancellation is excellent, and with a tap of a button you can switch to ambient listening mode which passes external sounds from the environment through the speaker. Sound quality is phenomenal, and on Android there are a lot of nice presets for custom equalization settings. Battery life is pretty good, but I'm hoping for a bit better in the next generation. Overall, best buy of 2019 for me. Should have gotten them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for playing music
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic audio playback and received call sound quality, among the best. They fit comfortably even after hours of wear. They also are secure - never had one fall out. People on the other end of my calls complain about keyboard noise and other background noise. Overall, I love them for playing music, but they are not the best for making voice calls.
customer_reviews.author: zobotek

customer_reviews.title: Quality wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Straight to the point, this is a good quality wireless earbuds, it has a long lasting battery, I get a good 8 hours of battery life, it’s fits very well in your ear without stretching your ear and it doesn’t fall out easy, the sound quality is very good, I use it at my job which has loud noises and I hear only my music and nothing else, I love it and definitely recommend to anyone trying to buy a quality earbud
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love these !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the complaints are about in other reviews, but I love these ear buds! The battery life works fine for me, especially since I have wireless charging with my Galaxy S10. I had my phone on the 2nd floor of my house and went into the basement without losing connection. I leave my phone on my patio and am able to work all over my back yard without losing connection. The sound is perfectly adequate...these aren't audiophile-perfect but are great as far as I'm concerned. I managed to annoy both of my teenagers while wearing them because they have tried to talk to me and I haven't answered...because I couldn't hear them!
customer_reviews.author: J Bo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love these way more than I thought I would. I bought them when they went on sale because I was sick of my Power Beats 3 getting pinched behind my neck on barbell squats and tangled on other movements. These cancel noise way better, are more intuitive to control and require less charging as they charge in the case and the case seems to need charging less often than my Power Beats did. I still think the sound quality was slightly better in the Power Beats, but if it is, it's negligible. When used for phone calls people say they here me very clearly. All around great! Very happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: mystictealta

customer_reviews.title: Not good for calls
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for me and my husband to replace our LG headphones. NOT Happy! These work great for music and watching videos but, sucks for calls. We've had them since AUG 2019 and it now Dec 2019. SO we have given them a fair chance in different situations. When on calls people say they cant hear us or we sound muffled, but hear all the background sound, or far away or it breaks up while talking. we have done the app upgrades and the different functions. Still sucks. I hate that we are stuck when them cause we end up just using the phone instead of the buds for calls. I wouldn't by another pair..
customer_reviews.author: STap

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a picky older guy. He happens to love earbuds and music so I figured it might work out well. He tends to fight with technology so I was worried with the tap features that he would end up getting frustrated. The sound on these is great and the set up was thankfully painless. According to his wife, he's been practically living in these. His favorite feature is the ambient setting since he walks the dogs along a busy roadway everyday. Overall, he loves them. From what I've used of them, they seemed like a nice overall set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JMMorton

customer_reviews.title: Came with A51, so can't complain!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use these yet...they are my husband's, as he ordered the bundle pack with the A51 and these buds for $400. They feel of high quality, so I have no doubts in my mind these will work perfect! Plus, they came with ear pieces that you can change out if you need smaller or larger for the buds to stay in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't expecting much, but..
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting too much from these buds because of the reviews I watched and read, but this product turned out great. PROS - mic is crystal clear from both ends. This is the reason why I had my doubts because a lot of them were saying mic sucks. - if don't want your buds with wings, they provide rubbers without them. - sound is clean. Real clean even high volume. - ambient sound is a yes for me. CONS - not much bass, but that's okay. If you want bass, go buy beats. I guess that's pretty much it. Other than that, it's a great buy. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: rachelle

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these... I went from iPods to these in hope that i could control them as i have a note phone. Pros... noise cancelling The ear buds battery life Cons.... People cant hear me as well I cant turn off the touch option(I turn it off it doesnt work) Big and clunky. The charger case is slow to charge the earbuds The charger case has to be charged every 24hrs(maybe less) but it's dead on me all the time. If the ipods didnt have a glitch where they go max volume when it switches songs I would have stuck with them... I'll be looking for other ones
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wagnon

customer_reviews.title: my worst buy on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed, I'm so upset I wasted money buying these, Yes its used but you would expect its used and it would still work, well these does not work at all i plug it in to charge and no light comes on it I really can't do nth with it. It has the regular wear and tear scratch on the pouch so u can see it has been used the charger seem to be new. The charger works because it charges my phone. I don't kmow about the sound cancelation, battery life or sound quality bcuz It did come on for me to test it. I'm jus so disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: R-jae

customer_reviews.title: Poor call quality
customer_reviews.text: I had these for about 3 days and was never able to use them for phone calls because the call quality was so poor! I wish I had looked at reviews outside of Amazon before the purchase. There are thousands of reviews complaining of the exact same issues, poor call quality. The static is so bad the caller can barely make out what I was saying during the call. Very disappointed in Amazon chat support also. I initiated the chat support and got an immediate response, which was good. Then for the next 5 - 10 minutes I never heard from the support person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the price or quality...very dussapionted
customer_reviews.text: Well I was excited to get these but they are not what I was expecting..they are definitely what they say ..no warranty ,they keep falling out of my ears and right side doesn't charge right ..I have used all parts to see if that was problem but that didnt help so I definitely going return them for refund ..I don't know if will ever order ear buds again definitely not happy and especially for that kind of noney.. also they claiming to have a 2 year warranty but that's definitely not correct. I ask for company information but they gave me a cell phone number and have no way to contact the company ...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hess

customer_reviews.title: After 2 other BT wireless headphones/buds, these hit the spot.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these about a year ago, and I was impressed. When they popped up on Woot for <$100 I went for it. No regrets - these are now my go-to headphones. Samsung Galaxy S9.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fick

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Earbuds Review
customer_reviews.text: Have been needing some headphones & these are great. I wish they were smaller they feel really bulky in your ear. Ear tips are the first ever to fit my tiny ears. The color is beautiful and stands out really well. For some reason my right earbud dies much faster then my left one. Charging case chargers very quickly, so far I've been able to get 6 hours of battery life. -wife
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: The BEST truly wireless headphones for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I bought these used so I did get them at lower than their retail value. But seeing as they're often on sale I can feel confident in saying that somehow, Samsung has won the truly wireless ear bud battle for 2019. These things are super compact, sound good (not amazing, but super good for what they are) and have amazing battery life! I have tried about 6 other pairs with these and all of them have one huge failure (size, sound quality, connection quality, etc). These are the only ones that tick every box and I couldn't be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Daycak

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for almost a year and now one earbud will not charge higher than 5%. Big disappointment as I really enjoyed using these under my helmet while riding. Sound for the user is great with solid bass and clear mid/high range. However call quality for the people on the other end definitely is substandard to point of being useless. Slim form factor is nice as is the clean pairing with process for Samsung brand phones. Just wish they would have continued to work at until their 1 year anniversary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They only last about 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad they only lasted 2 years but it isn't the most disappointing thing but the left ear started to get a scratchy sound and they started getting louder in the right ear than quietrr in the right and loud in the left and it kept on happening over and over and now they quit it took about a there for that to happen though the first year was fine no problems about the best things I bought not very satisfied with them now though
customer_reviews.author: Ban Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Slick-looking earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Really like how they look. They don't stick out of your ears like others (Bose). The sound is pretty good. Adjust the settings and earbud tips to find a proper fit sound. I have a Note 10+ and they connect 99 percent of the time. The calls sound fine but the mic is terrible. People cant hear me well at times. No aptx hd bluetooth codec. Using the scalable Samsung codec since my phone is a Samsung. I cant remember if I bought these used or if they were an open box item. They arrived just fine. I have no issues with their QC process.
customer_reviews.author: auser

customer_reviews.title: WOW WOW WOW
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the earbuds and how nicely they feel in my ear. I have been looking at other headphones like the galaxy buds, but these are the nicest ones yet. Yes the price is a little steep and its because you are paying for quality. The app and setup is really easy to use, also they have a good connection up to 20 ft or so. With my Samsung Galaxy S8+ they work seamlessly(they are airpods but for the galaxy). Also they do have really good noise cancelling. I do suggest these buds for anyone who listens to music a lot and uses ear buds on a daily bases.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love just about everything about these headphones. They sit in my ear and it looks much better than some other brands that protrude. The case is very small and easy to fit in a woman's pocket (very important). Charging is very easy, I use these everyday at work and I've yet to run out of battery. Just pop them back in the case when you're not using the, and you won't either. There are no buttons, everything is touch activated which makes for easy song changes and pauses. My only qualm is that you can't adjust the volume using the headphones. I would rather have volume access than Siri access.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Fiero

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wireless Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -seamless connectivity with my Note 9 running One UI -Wireless charging -Small form factor -No "master bud" trait (where one bud is dominant, and if it dies the other one can't be used) Not really a con, the sound quality is better than the airpods (first gen at this time), but not quite as rich as the Bose Sound Sports. But the Bose make me feel like I'm wearing satellite dishes, and I haven't finished playing with my eq setting for the Samsung's yet. Edit: After about a week of tweaking eq settings and trying different ear-tips and wings, these buds sound just as good as the Bose' if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: No volume control on a phone call
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality and I liked the fit. Since I would be mostly using these for phone calls, I expected to be able to answer and hang up calls, of course. For the price, I also expected to be able to adjust the volume of the call and mute calls using the buds. Unfortunately, volume adjustment can only be made using the phone while on a call. This was a deal breaker for me and it is not mentioned anywhere. I called Samsung tech support to be sure I wasn’t missing something - I wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably bad product, fully regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Samsung Galaxy Earbuds just for my dad to use for talking on the phone. So I didnt have any great expectations on music audio quality or any other bells and whistles. These earbuds are a total waste of money, there is a lot of background noise and I missed the return period. Incoming voice is not clear. My Plantronics Legend is light years better in sound and microphone quality. I have given it to my dad and now I am stuck with these earbuds. Please do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, easy to use, connections so so
customer_reviews.text: Found these easy to use and connect to smartphone. Didn't have any problem with volume Do have problems with music cutting out with phone in my hip pocket. Pretty irritating. If I keep the phone on a front shirt pocket, I don't have the problem. Tough, mowing lawn in a t-shirt. Noice cancellation.....really couldn't validate this is an optional feature. Especially while mowing the lawn. I still need to use the over ear hearing protection. Oh well Considered returning, but didn't, and still use around the shop while tying flies.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I got them from a bundle deal with my phone. I was in the market for a new pair of wireless earbuds and was lucky to get them for free. If I didn't need the phone, theses are definitely solid contenders for $100. Sound is great, bass didn't wow me. You can toggle a bass booster on the app which helps. Depending on what your listening to, the feature overall is nice. Sturdy case, and nice build quality. I like the touch buttons, I don't feel like I'm pushing the buds deeper into my brain.
customer_reviews.author: phothala bounmaphouxay

customer_reviews.title: I love these earbuds and use them daily...
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a 5 star rating if the battery life and call quality was better. While the battery is not bad, I travel a bit and have found that I can't use them in an all-day travel scenario without an external battery to recharge them in-flight. As for the call quality, do not buy them for calling in a professional setting. The calls quality sucks for business calls but I guess would be okay for personal. Otherwise these are perfect for sitting around with low profile, wireless earbuds. Plus they look way better them Apple Airpods which look ridonkulous.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID ELY

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Battery
customer_reviews.text: I got these for myself but my mom keeps borrowing them for her audio books, she has used them for 6-7hrs at a time without having to recharge them. She always recharges them after use so not sure how much longer than that they last. She has noticed some crackling happening once in a while but we're not sure if it is from interference from other devices in the house or if it is the headphones themselves. I love how they look, so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to pair with everything I've tried. I would much rather have a volume control on the devices than the digital assistant or Bixby. I bought these purely for listening to music, perhaps a pair that is only for music? If there's such a earbud out there, I'd definitely be interested....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great General Usage Bud and Good NC
customer_reviews.text: Great General purpose ear buds . I tested them at work in a rather noisey environment that also relies on communication. Sound performance is really good as with almost any headphones and earbuds and todays mobile safety features . The volume is a bit lacking on some devices . Fast charging and long play time though is an even trade if you're in it for a long haul . Noise cancelation is ok for buds but .I wouldn't really rely on buds for that mission anyway .Ambient noise however is stellar and should be something more people should put into consideration. Especially when in transit .
customer_reviews.author: EarlZH

customer_reviews.title: Sound is clear & STAYS in my ears!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! My husband gave these to me to for Christmas and these are fantastic!! The synced right up to my phone immediately, gave me a short tutorial, and worked perfectly. Regular ear buds never fit in my ears, ever-- but these never came out while I was at the gym, and stayed put the whole time! The noise cancelling to the outside world was so good - I couldn't hear my daughter talking to me. The voice activation was also a nice addition that I didn't realize was an option that also works great, but I have been just using the touch mode. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: K.A.S

customer_reviews.title: TAKE MY MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These buds are AWESOME! 10 out of 10. I bought the black ones for my 12 year old. He gave em a high review. So i broke down and bought the silver ones. As soon as my son saw em he instantly regretted not getting thr silver ones. Very unique color. Will definitely stand out. You definitely need to get an equalizer on your phone and break down for a premium song servive with HD streaming. That is when you will know how bad ass these buds are. Highs, Lows, and Mids are all on point. Quality streaming produces quality sounds GET THESE TO FEEL THE MUSIC
customer_reviews.author: Abel C

customer_reviews.title: Manny from Brooklyn
customer_reviews.text: Fast connection fit great in my ear love the visibility low key and i also love the sound the gear equalizer immense the sound quality as i written my review i have both earbuds on watching TV with the ambience on wow that is a great option love love it
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Louis

customer_reviews.title: The best Buds for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of low to mid priced wireless, stereo, earbuds, but have always been let down; usually ending up with only one working earbud [yes, Movone I'm looking at you], but should've gone with Samsung to start. Maybe a bit higher priced, but still reasonable. They have performed perfectly. Good sound and volume. Syncs and pairs without problem. If I had any complaint it would be that the touchpad mode of operating the buds took some getting used to. That however changes with a few days usage. Very happy with these buds.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard T. Bzura

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headphones for the Samsung ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: I own a Galaxy S10 and a Galaxy Fit so I was looking a good pair of wireless earbuds and I did quite a lot of research. At the end I picked the Galaxy Buds because I love how easy it is to keep them paired, you just open them and they connect. Sound quality was fine but after changing the ear tip to the biggest one that made a big difference for me, isolating the sound and improving the bass. The price might seem a bit high if you consider them to those $40 wireless earbuds in the market but here you are buying quality and peace of mind. No connection issues whatsoever, at least in the Samsung ecosystem.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Melchor

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Good sound quality (Don't expect hi end audio from any pair of earbuds but they do sound pretty good) -Great battery life -Comfortable -No lag when watching video (youtube) -Compact charging case with wireless charging Cons: -The volume levels could have better adjustment. (Volume 3 is too loud and volume 2 is a bit soft. Can we get a volume 2.5?) -Doesn't work well with my kindle. For some reason the audio doesn't stay in sync in both ears. Luckily I can use just one earbud at a time. Also the tap and hold to adjust volume doesn't work like on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Well this 2nd pair i bought, didn't last very long. The left headphone volume is super low, and i've try to reset and everything and nothing works. I would of returned this item, however...it quit working a few days after my return time was up. This is no reflection on the seller. I'm a huge Samsung user, but these earbuds have been a great disappointment since i bought the first pair. When they work...they work amazing!!! I will say that much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing when using the app, compatibility is the phenomenal, had some issues with cutitng out occasionally but not that often, range is about 33 feet, very easy to use, touch controls are responsive and easy to use, also had an issue with compatibility with spoitfy occasionally but I think it's a software problem with my phone and the drivers for the buds. Best ones I've gotten so far, better than the jabra elete active. I'd recommend these to anyone who is looking for amazing sound and ling battery life, these last the advertised 6 hours easily.
customer_reviews.author: maikel m.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Wireless Earbuds, Particularly For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Samsung knocked it out of the park with these. The sound quality and battery life is excellent compared to the obvious competitor (Airpods). A small, sleek case that fits easily in your pocket and allows wireless charging. Great noise cancellation by default, because they form a seal in your ear, which further improves the overall sound quality vs. the open style of Airpods, particularly in the bass department. The rubber stabilizers on these buds "lock" into your ear and stay in easily when exercising. Comfortable for long periods of use. Simple and effective touch controls. Overall, I couldn't ask for better.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love these Buds
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my Daughter-in-Law, but I also own a pair that I received when I bought my new Note 10+. These are the first earbuds that has fit my ear comfortably and stays in. I love the sound on these and my daughter-in-law does too and she also loves the fit as well. I have tried so many earbuds for the fit and sound these are the first I am totally happy with. Love the fact that the case allows wireless charging or wired charging. Very satisfied with the battery life also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Galaxy Buds True Wireless Earbuds (Wireless Charging Case included), Black – US Version
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:SinglePair Samsung Galaxy Buds with your phone or tablet and go. Listen and chat during the day, then wirelessly recharge for 15 minutes to get up to 1. 7 more hours of play time. Tuned by AKG, Galaxy Buds deliver clear calls, your favorite podcasts and the music you love while keeping you aware of your surroundings when walking, working or working out. water proof IPX2 (Splash resistant).Battery Capacity (Earbud) 58mAh.Battery Capacity (Case) 252mAh. Compatible Specification of Smartphone: Android 5.0 ↑ , 1.5GB ↑. Wireless Range: BT 5.0, Bixby Connection: Yes,Talk Time: 5H Earbud ; 6H Cradle,Play Time:6H Earbud ; 7H Cradle,Sensors: Accelerometer, IR, Hall, Touch.
feature_bullets: Premium sound Tuned by AKG, an optimized driver offers substantial bass, while a volume driver gives you a wider range of sound

The Galaxy Buds pairs with both Android and iOS compatible devices via Bluetooth connection. Use with a smartphone and tablet running Android 5. 0 or higher & RAM 1. 5GB above. Automatic sync and Ambient Aware Mode only available for Android; iOS users can use Voice Command/Siri
US Version: Comes with Quick Start Guide, and 1 Year Product (information on the retail package).Android 7.1.1 or higher required.Battery Capacity (Earbud):58mAh
Power up to power on Get up to six hours of battery life with an additional seven hours from the case that doubles as a wireless charger
Just what you want to hear Control how much surrounding noise you want with Ambient Aware. Quick Ambient Mode lets you hear traffic, flight announcements and coworkers calling out to you
Sounds good. Feels good. Galaxy Buds come in three adjustable ear tip and wingtip sizes right from the box
Resists water With splash resistant technology, your Galaxy Buds handle splashes, sweat and spills

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars17,634 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
